unnormalised: Barabor, tumi kitle bhajipalo ani vostu ami *khorench* gheta mhunn vichartat, haka? Mhaka sangonk di, tem Amma shopping kortat tacher adharit asa. Ti kortat zalear, toiar ravat!
normalised: Borem, tumi vichartat ki ami kitli bhaji ani vostu krid kortat, khari? Borem, hanv tumkam sangtam, tem Amma shopping kortat zalear nirbhar asta. Ti kortat zalear, toiar ravat!

unnormalised: Poilem mhunllear, ti sumar 5 kg batate ghetli. Kiteak? Kiteak "aloo sabzi upyogi asta," ami fattlim satolle 3 pavttim khal'lem aslem tori. Ani kandyanchi toond uzoyonakat. Ti ek ek korun nivddteli, tim soglem exact 75 g astolem mhunn pako korteli, hanv soput gheun sangtam! Magir ti dukandarak sumar â‚¹2 protikg hisoban bhik magteli. "Tattv asa, beta!"
normalised: Poilem, ti sumar panch kilogram batate gheto. Kiteak? Kiteak "aloo sabzi versatile asa," ami fattimchea satolleant teen fautti keli asli tori. Ani kandeanchem mhaka uloi naka. Ti dor ek kando vegllo kaddteli, te sab seven'tee panch gram asat mhunn nischit korteli, hanv shapath ghetan! Magir ti vikretevangod sumar don rupia prati kilogram bargain korteli. "Ho siddhant asa, beta!"

unnormalised: Dusrem mhunllear, tamatar. Tim Rs. 20/kg khala vikreak aslear, ti ek purai pett ghetli. "Khaipe asta! Tomato chutney kor!" ami dor satolle chutneychi balti korunk vel asa mhunn taka dista. Ani magir kotmiri asa. 2 punji zai, khas korun 30 cm lambai astoli dor ek, odhik nhoi, unni nhoi, ani fokot tazi hirvi astoli!
normalised: Uprant, tomatam. Tim rupia vis prati kilogram-ankam komi vikri kortat zalear, ti pura pett gheto. "Kitlen sovkai! Tomato chutney kor!" jaisen ami dor satolleant bucket-anchem chutney korpak vell asa. Ani magir tuka dhaniacho aspav asa. Don bundle zai, khas korun tees centimeter lambai asat, odik nhoi, komi nhoi, ani fokot chokchokit hirve!

unnormalised: "Thode thode soglle vachun ghe" visronakat. Tem 1/2 kg dor ek bhindi, baingan, ani eka ajibat vachunk yena asleli hirvi panam, kadachit "iron" khatir borem. Dev tumkam rakhondiyek asundi tumi 250 g alle, tharavle promannem visortat zalear! Tem chai khatir, spasht asun asa.
normalised: "Thodde thodde soglle vostu" visrunakat. Zachem bhaxantor dhaktim, baingan, ani ek ajibat panam asloli hirvi bhaji ji hanv uloipanak shakyanam, kadechit "lohannachem" khatir borem asa. Tumim don'shem ani panch gram ale, nirdharit visrunge zalear Devan tumkam madad korchi poddteli! Tem chakka khatir asa, nirmollpan.

unnormalised: Ani ho, sadhi monshya tankam zai tem ghetat. Amma purn mohallak khavoita itlem ghetta. Ani kitem tari korun, ti tem soglem eka pavttim ghora haddta. Hanv soput gheun sangtam tika superpower asa.
normalised: Taka lagun ho, samanya lok tankam kiteak zai tem krid kortat. Amma pura mohallank possonk puro zaunk krid kortat. Ani kitem tori, ti tem sogllem ekach fauttin ghara haddteli. Hanv shapath ghetan tika superpowers asat.
